chunks.zh: 都陆续放假了，我还要连上四天，要吐了。。。。
chunks.en: Everyone is on vacation, but I still have to work for four more days. I'm going to throw up....

chunks.zh: 本来连上 10 天就挺累的，但是今天看到群里别的小伙伴都放假了，心里更累了。难过，上吐了要。
chunks.en: It was already tiring to work for 10 days in a row, but seeing the other people in the group on vacation today made me even more tired. Sad, I'm going to throw up.

chunks.zh: 不用着急，能回你的都没放假。
chunks.en: Don't worry, those who can reply to you are not on vacation.

chunks.zh: 大周和调休，恩情根本还不完
chunks.en: Big weeks and compensatory days off, the favor can never be paid back.

chunks.zh: 不错了，至少你是在赚钱的，看看人家做 A 股的，年前还得连亏 4 天，还人一边吃着人日喂的💩一边鼓掌，洋溢着欢乐的气氛
chunks.en: That's not bad, at least you're making money. Look at those who trade A-shares, they have to lose money for 4 consecutive days before the Spring Festival, and they still applaud while eating the 💩 fed by the People's Daily, brimming with a joyful atmosphere.

chunks.zh: 连上 21 天的还没有说话
chunks.en: Those who worked 21 days in a row haven't spoken yet.

chunks.zh: 你们工作这么努力，相比公司效益一定很好吧。
chunks.en: You work so hard, the company's efficiency must be very good.

chunks.zh: 还有 6 天班
chunks.en: 6 more days of work.

chunks.zh: @jaycelhz 你这是感谢金家将军的恩情吗。。。。
chunks.en: @jaycelhz Are you thanking General Kim for his kindness....

chunks.zh: 连上十天吗？？我们是连上 9 天算上今天还有四天班要上。全家都放假，就我一个人还要去上班。
chunks.en: Working ten days in a row?? We worked 9 days and still have to work for four more days including today. The whole family is on vacation, but I'm the only one who has to go to work.

chunks.zh: 连上 11 的在这。。不要慌
chunks.en: Working 11 days in a row here... Don't panic.

chunks.zh: 我也连上十天。。。
chunks.en: I also worked ten days in a row...

chunks.zh: @hay313955795 #4 我们也是连上九天还要上四天，人都麻了。
chunks.en: @hay313955795 #4 We also worked nine days and still have to work for four more days, everyone is numb.

chunks.zh: 我前天想点楼下的预制菜时都发现人家从 1 号放到 19 号，不做我们生意了
chunks.en: The day before yesterday, I wanted to order pre-made dishes downstairs, but I found out they were closed from the 1st to the 19th, and they are not doing business with us.

chunks.zh: 我从 22 号到现在就没放假了，今天是连上的第 13 天
chunks.en: I haven't had a vacation since the 22nd, today is the 13th consecutive day.

chunks.zh: 一样的。 感恩福报哈哈
chunks.en: Same here. Grateful for the blessings haha

chunks.zh: 连上 11 天，算了今天又是摸鱼的一天。
chunks.en: Worked 11 days in a row, never mind, today is another day of slacking off.

chunks.zh: 连着上到 2 月 5 号放假。。
chunks.en: Working continuously until February 5th for vacation...

chunks.zh: 你们大年 30 我还要上班呢
chunks.en: I still have to work on the 30th of the Lunar New Year.

chunks.zh: 我现在就在公司回复你
chunks.en: I'm replying to you in the company right now.

chunks.zh: 还好我失业了，不然也得连上好多天
chunks.en: Luckily, I'm unemployed, otherwise I'd have to work for many consecutive days.

chunks.zh: 我们也大小周……直接干到除夕…………
chunks.en: We also have alternate work weeks... working straight through to New Year's Eve...
